title: Guess who just got a brand spanking new, fancy-as-f*ck monitor
body:
4K UHD! WOOO!

1ms response time! These images gonna be as goddamn smooth as a poro's tongue!

I can turn this thing on it's f\*cking side whenever the hell I want, useful for all the programming I'm totally *~~not~~* going to be doing!

WOOOOOOOO!

Merry smegging Christmas to me!

So what did all you ~~losers~~ get?
